ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] medicalHistory with data type String
Provides the textual description of the subjective complaints like if the hearing loss is present, if the tinnitus is present etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] diagnosisSummary with data type String
Provides a textual summary of audiologic test results.

Contains exactly one [1..1] physicalExam with data type String
Provides a textual description of the objective findings on pure tone threashold, speech recognition score etc. to evaluate the hearing loss.

Contains exactly one [1..1] diagnosticAndClinicalTests with data type String
Provides results of all diagnostic and clinical tests conducted in the examination report.

Contains exactly one [1..1] diagnosticAndClinicalTests with data type String
Provides results of all diagnostic and clinical tests conducted in the examination report.
